Name: Nice product
Review_Description__c:
Ordered on Tuesday, Delivered next day and Installation on Thursday. So good job there, Flipkart team.

About the AC, will know much more about 4-6 months later; however the initial days have been good. Cools Immediately, Very less Noise and Neon Light which glows at Night. Works for me. 

Brilliant Choice at this Price & to top it all, Voltas = Brand TATA !!

Go for it.

Name: Feedback
Review_Description__c:
Hello everyone, I generally don''t write review. But, I will write for this one because I have heard many negative feedback about flipkart on Quora and I was in doubt whether to purchase it from Flipkart or not.
Lets talk about Flipkart first.
Delivery was on time and It was free. 
Installation was also free however you have to pay for stands (750 Rupees in my case) . Voltage regulator is optional.
So, overall I am happy with the service of flipkart.
Now, coming to AC
It's around 1000 watt machine works on Single Phase power supply  which do produce humming sound (which is quite normal). Cooling is pretty good and fast. I have been using this product for last 10 days and I have not found any issue with cooling.
Overall this product is good.

Name: Pathetic installtion service
Review_Description__c: First the voltas AC is really good, all copper, chill fast but not good service from flipkart, Delivered wrong time slot, Wrong AC delivered (Not look like in display). Next the pathetic experience was installation(by jeeves). They collect from me extra bucks 1800rs for extra copper line and wire. When I ask for receipt they told me you will get on your registered email. Still waiting for bill. Now my outlet ac have water spilling on joint because of they did not jointed it well. I called jeeves and flipkart. They are referring me service center. So guys better to buy offline or reputed store.

records.Name: EXTRA CHARGES FOR COPPER LINE AND WIRE
RECOMMENDATION TO BUY FROM OFFLINE/REPUTED STORE

Name: Simply awesome
Review_Description__c: Using for last 10 days. No issue found yet. Perfectly running. Cooling is very fast. Remote functionalities are user friendly. Flipkart  delivered next day and installation done by LG within one day. Though installation done smoothly but the installation guys are not professional they broken the wall plaster and color in many places and one person called me and continuously pushing me to get extra services like wrapping of copper pipe, vocum of the compressor, water pipe more than required etc. Atlast I purchased the outdoor unit stand from them at rs 850 which is actually very higher than market. Water pipe 21 rs per ft + GST. My requirement was 6ft but they pushed me to buy 8ft. In my case overall installation cost was rs 1600 including 499 standard installation charge. I suggest for LG product insulation tape wrapping is not required for outdoor coper pipes as it already has one fome cover which is Good.

Name: Absolute rubbish!
Review_Description__c:
I ordered to my native. But received other model. Since my parents don't kW online, they  thought it's right product.
Very bad service from flipcart, product delivery taken 15 days extra than committed, and installation taken one month. Service man will charge like anything even it's free installation.

Don't ever go online eVen it's cheap

Name: Just wow!
Review_Description__c:
this is a comprehensive review after using it for about 2 week's. I purchased it for 28.5 k and I did installation by local expert guy as Jeeves would also charge me for the same so why not a local expert. AC was installed properly.
I Use Iot In 10 * 12 ft room and it serve it purpose of keeping the room cool. This Summer I Am Escaping Heat Like A Pro.
the installation guy told me something that I am sure of. he recommend people to buy SPLIT over Inverter For low Power consumption. and literally he mean it.
So I Would Consider This fact while purchasing the next AC for my another room. probably the recently launched media brand.

Name: Moderate
Review_Description__c: They AC is Good. BUT .. DO NOT Purchase from Flipkart.  The installation Guys CHARGE like HELL . The standard Installation is 1600 and the basic iron stand is extra 850 . I don't know what is that 1600 for . If they have to do correct drilling in the wall . That costs another 1500 bucks . so on an average you will spend around 4000 INR on installation which is mostly free in dealer shops scheme's. It is NOT OVER.  the guys who came to install cut the electric wire in the wall. I had to call an electrician to fix that and spend another 500 on that plus those fools left 2 holes in my wall trying to find the correct place for core drilling and STILL ended up cutting the wire . SO DON'T GO THROUGH HELL and DO Not buy from here

Name: Nice product
Review_Description__c: The received product is good so far. The indoor unit is quiet enough , but outdoor unit can get loud at times.  The cooling is nice and fast. Remote could be made more intuitive. If you are very noise sensitive , keep the outdoor unit away from your sleeping point. LG should improve their electronics and give WIFI for all this range of models. The fixing process was poor.  No vacuum pump used before releasing gas. Even a small amount of trapped air is harmful for the refrigeration system. Even after requesting it , they did not do this step.

Name: Must buy!
Review_Description__c: Best product. Good installation service.

Name: Brilliant
Review_Description__c:
My Search for 5star 1 ton ended up here. Happy for my purchase. Good cooling.
I was worried about the negative comments about the installation but my agents were professional and well mannered. Happy for the purchase. Go for it without a second thought and you will not regret. Will update about energy consumption after a week

Name: Just wow!
Review_Description__c: Ok

Review_Description__c: Instalation boy good respect and work is good

Name: Very Good
Review_Description__c: good ...value for money

Name: Best in the market!
Review_Description__c:
Nice and efficient AC. It Cools 100+ sqft within 5 min. Very silent also. No other manufacturers are providing warranty on PCB. No doubt best AC in the market.
 No light and glowing buttons in remote is a drawback. Jeeves service is not good. 
I got it installed from LG directly. I'll suggest to book installation request through LG customer care itself.

Name: Value-for-money
Review_Description__c: Everything is good but installation is bit costly when compared with other installation bought offline.

Name: Worth the money
Review_Description__c:
Cooling is quick. Within 5 mins temperature will start dropping. I live in Mumbai and we do not get direct sunlight so walls are not very hot and AC doesn't have to struggle much. But i feel compressor is powerful. With dual inverter the output is quick. Outdoor unit is also very quiet. We have been using regularly since two months and I can say it's light on pockets as well.
Dual Inverter compressor = 5/5
Design = 3/5 (simple average looks. Not very fancy)
Quality = 4/5
Features = 3/5 (in particular I didn't find the 6-in-1 feature to be useful. When it's already an inverter AC why would I want to run it at 80% or 60% capacity. Compressor would anyways run at variable speed)
Wifi connectivity would have been really good. nowadays u easily get a smart AC at this price.
Installation: the installation team wasnt very helpful. I had to sit and wreck my brains with them. They try to increase charges by suggesting options that would require extra copper wires n stuff. Flipkart should start looking better options than Jeeves.

Name: Moderate
Review_Description__c: Item is very good  but original bill not yet handed over by Filipacart.

Name: Just wow!
Review_Description__c: BEAUTIFUL LOOKWISE & THE HIMALAYAN COOLING TECHNOLOGY IS NEXT LEVEL. In this mode its working like an 1.5ton AC + it is 5 star energy efficiency so a good option at 36-37k its awesome! Also you get sleep mode as u get in many out there. Overall not bad! LG is a brand and hope wont regret.

Review_Description__c: One week observation: The unit is awsome. Worth for money. Timely delivered by flipkart and installation done in time. But though its mentioned free installation,  the service engineers charged me 1200 rupees.

Name: Highly recommended
Review_Description__c:
Hi All. As i am Mechanical ac engineer i ll tell u how to choose an Ac for your house.
ANY BRAND AC U BUY OFF ANY PRICE LL WORK FINE TILL 6 MONTHS. Wat matters is after 6 months how well ur AC is working Brands like sansui etc etc which s not AC manufacturing brands ll not last more than 6 months u ll face problems later.Choose from ac manufacturer first if u want life.Thn buy according to ur room measurment.Buy 5 star rating or inverter AC for power saving nd good cooling.better choose copper instead aluminum. Check d product review nd video in youtube.compare inbetween selected.do not buy china brands.Finally do not judge any brand ac untill u use for 6 months

Name: Mind-blowing purchase
Review_Description__c: Very good product and discounted price from Flipkart. Timely delivery and prompt free installation.

Name: Wonderful
Review_Description__c: I have the product 1 month back.its very good product.performance is excellant. Received the product exactly on the said date and installation is being done as per the schedule. I didn't face any type of problem.thanks to flipcart for the wonderful service. I have ordered with of around 50000/-so far . I am very much satisfied of the service of flipcart.

Name: Fabulous!
Review_Description__c: It's an awesome product. I really loved it. I really wanna appreciate flipkart on such a prompt timely delivery and installation. I got the product delivered in 24hours and installation done in 48 hours. Product is too good.

Name: Useless product
Review_Description__c: Don't even think of buying this AC. A 8 year old AC has more cooling effect than this. It takes around 4 hours to cool my room while the other ACs in the house take just 10-15 min though the room size is same. Trusting Flipkart with AC was my biggest mistake. Online Shopping is best for phones and other small products. If you wanna buy big appliances, do yourself a favor and visit the nearest offline store near you.

Name: Just wow!
Review_Description__c:
Better than best availble in the market.Zero noice level .We feel like centrally a.c room.
Thanks Blue for developing world class product at best price.Highly energy efficient product also

Name: Good quality product
Review_Description__c: Really thankful to flip kart for resolving my issue and team is also helped so much produt is also very nice but only one thing that is delivery taken some extra time its full paisa vasool  product super thank u bluestar and flipkart team.

Name: Go for it !! Awesome product!!
Review_Description__c:
On time delivery as well as support from flipkart in installation! Love the way I got genuine product without any hassle !! Was slightly worried ordering AC online but flipkart you guys made sure it was smooth !! Blue star as always is best in class !! 

Thanks flipkart for building the trust further !!

Name: Classy product
Review_Description__c: 1 month running. Product is good as of now. Flip cart delivery was fast and on time. Installation done on time. Overall a good experience.

Name: Terrific purchase
Review_Description__c: Nice product .... Good for 600ft size of room .... 1 ton should be enough for this size of a Room .... Time option in AC would have made the product better .....

Name: Lost
Review_Description__c:
Product is nice n delivered on time as promised by flipkart.

But the return n refund policy is not fair for AC items.

Wrongly booked Aluminium condenser but they not replacing or changing the order even tough i said to order immediately on copper.
At last going to install only.Let's c how AL condenser life as compare to Copper condenser.

While buying it was in cash back of 3000 Rs Offer for 1st 100 customers but after 2 days the price down and same prize.flipkart has to concentrate their customers n offer value. i not got that cash back also...even i booked next day itself....flipkart saying within 1 day other customer might booked more than 100.  All in the business game.

Name: Must buy!
Review_Description__c: Blue star 1 on air conditioner is very good and it is making my 12x12 hall fully cooled within 10 minutes.. only thing is that at the time of placing order I got free installation from Blue star but when actual installation has been done the installation guy charged me 4100 rupees sayin that my outdoor unit have to be place little far away and copper wire is bit expensive..  but except installation part I am very happy with the ac...

Name: Great product
Review_Description__c: Really liked the product and overall delivery experience. The delivery was as per schedule as well as the installation.  Great job guys,  keep it up.

Name: Good choice
Review_Description__c: Delivery process its take to long but overall i am happy as flikart mention free installation i geted. specially blue star installation team very good they never asked me any money Even like to give tham some many they refused.

Name: Nice...Keep it up!
Review_Description__c: Good. Satisfied with the product and service. Best part of it is that I was saved of all the trouble of going out and making it look like I did a great job. Well, place an order, sit back, relax and let the professionals do the task!

Name: Great product
Review_Description__c: Simply wow.. Flipkart is best.. Really happy with service and the good quotation with quality products is remarkable :-) Thank you!!!

Name: Excellent
Review_Description__c:
Fabulous AC. Loved it! Super cool. Apart from free installation had to pay 3k for stabiliser and the holes. 
But totally worth it

Name: Must buy!
Review_Description__c: Nice product

Name: Worst experience ever!
Review_Description__c: Nice product & Nice support by Flipkart... IntiaIly got the defective product but with continuous follow up product has been replaced.... overall better product....

Name: Terrific

Name: Super
Review_Description__c: For installation person taken my self RS. 1500/-.but the flipkart online shopping  show free, free, free. This is too bad.pls,try flipkart.,my money on back to me. (return). This is my advice & review. Thank you for flipkart.

Name: Brilliant

Name: Received broken Condenser
Review_Description__c: Hi, Its my second review for the AC, while unpackaging got to know its condenser is broken from outside. AC works well no issue with cooling. Placed replacement request, waiting for another piece.

Name: Fair
Review_Description__c: One year old stock. Very big outdoor unit.  Cooling in 15 mins for a 10 X 12 room. Silent units, both indoor and outdoor. Installation done by Bluestar not by Jeeves.

Name: Brilliant
Review_Description__c: I have tested it.

Name: Good product
Review_Description__c: Very good cooling. No complaints.

Name: Above-average product
Review_Description__c: Nice

Name: Disappointed with BlueStar service
Review_Description__c:
FlipKart delivered AC within 2 days after order placement - good service as usual, BlueStar service is below expectation.

1) Installation is done with multiple issues - one of them is, wiring is not taped and vulnerable for shocks.
2) Trained Engineers are required.
3) As committed this AC doesn't come with free installation - engineer will find some way to charge you.

I would not recommend this brand.

Name: Flipkart is really good but bluestar disappointed me
Review_Description__c: Flipkart delivered the AC within 2 days and it working absolutely fine. This AC works very well in a big hall as well. The only thing that was a problem is Bluestar service. They installed it 10 days after the delivery of AC and that too after calling the customer care several times.

Name: Just wow!

Name: Waste of money!
Review_Description__c: Flipkart and product is 5 star. It cools my 350 sqft drawing room in 10 minutes. But bluestar service is minus 4 star. They harrased me and made me repent the decsion of buying the ac online. Pls refrain.

Name: Wonderful
Review_Description__c: Good product

Name: Does the job
Review_Description__c: Up to 3rd year it worked well, but in the 4th year it became worthless. The coil developed leakage and the company's engineer says that it needed to change for making it work properly. If you are ready to spend Rs. 13000 as estimate given by company's engineer then go for Blue Star AC.
